name: Rhythmia (Zeptonix)
description:
Rhythmia is a skill based game, featuring map editor. Current version is BT02P0319, it contains:

-Map editor.

-Skill points system.

-3 mods to increase the difficulty.

-Simple profile system.

-Game settings.

To add in future:

-Official website with all the maps, plays and profiles. (Soon)

-Customizable profile. (Soon)

-Replays. (Soon)

-New mods. (Soon)

-Auto BPM detection in mapping. (Not quite soon)

-Multiplayer. (Not quite soon)

  Discord server:

        (https://discord.gg/9m9RKbQ)
